channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell EMC VxRail Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell EMC VxRail Appliance

item.title: CVE-2023-32463|2024-08-02T15:18:37.211Z -- dell -- dell%20emc%20vxrail%20appliance
item.description: Dell VxRail, version(s) 8.0.100 and earlier contain a denial-of-service vulnerability in the upgrade functionality. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to degraded performance and system malfunction.

item.title: CVE-2023-32464|2024-08-02T15:18:37.355Z -- dell -- dell%20emc%20vxrail%20appliance
item.description: Dell VxRail, versions prior to 7.0.450, contain an improper certificate validation vulnerability. A high privileged remote attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to carry out a man-in-the-middle attack by supplying a crafted certificate and intercepting the victim's traffic to view or modify a victimâ€™s data in transit.
